title: Danske Bank A/S, transactions by persons discharging managerial responsibilities
snippet: Danske Bank A/S, transactions by persons discharging managerial responsibilities Published: 2025-08-20 11:33:50 CEST Danske Bank A/S - Managers' Transactions Danske Bank A/S, transactions by persons discharging managerial responsibilities 20 August 2025 Notification no. 58/2025 Transactions made by persons obliged to report transactions to the Danish FSA and Nasdaq Copenhagen, cf. the EU Market Abuse Regulation.
